interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Hannibal Rising [Blu-ray]
Review Date: 2019/12/24
Store: Gaspard Ulliel  (Actor),     Rhys Ifans  (Actor),     Peter Webber  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    R    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
Product Description: ['Product Description', "Import Blu-ray/Region A pressing. Directed by Peter Webber. Hannibal Rising is the terrifying Silence of the Lambs prequel that reveals the history of the infamous Hannibal and how he came to be a cannibalistic murderer. After young Hannibal is forced to watch his little sister, Mischa, devoured by starving soldiers in his homeland Lithuania, Hannibal vows to avenge his sister's death by slaying those who committed not only war crimes against the Lecters, but also against other families during WW II. In detailing Hannibal's revenge plan, the film investigates the psychological implications of witnessing cannibalism to justify Hannibal's insatiable appetite for human flesh.", 'Review', "Though Hannibal Rising's Lecter (Gaspard Ulliel) is a pussycat compared to Anthony Hopkins in Silence of the Lambs, this sequel's story of revenge is grizzly enough to satisfy lovers of Thomas Harris's epic tale. After young Hannibal (Aaron Thomas) is forced to watch his little sister, Mischa (Helena Lia Tachovska), devoured by starving soldiers in his homeland Lithuania, Hannibal vows to avenge his sister's death by slaying those who committed not only war crimes against the Lecters, but also against other families during WW II. In detailing Hannibal's revenge plan, the film investigates the psychological implications of witnessing cannibalism to justify Hannibal's insatiable appetite for human flesh. The most interesting aspect of Hannibal Rising its analytical connections drawn between Hannibal's childhood traumas and his murderous adult obsessions is also the film's weak point. The links oversimplify Lecter's complex character. For example, though titillating to see flashbacks of Lecter's sister hacked up and boiled while Lecter visits a Parisian meat market, the reference is too obvious. One learns why he excels in his medical school classes dissecting cadavers, and we're given explicit explanation for why he slices off and eats his victims' cheeks. The story only complicates when Hannibal interacts with his sexy Aunt, Lady Murasaki (Gong Li). When Murasaki educates him in the art of beheading, the viewer sees Hannibal's sword fetish as a manifestation of physical lust. --Trinie Dalton --Amazon.com"]
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Horror', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, Import, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Gaspard Ulliel, Rhys Ifans, Aaran Thomas, Peter Webber, Helena-Lia Tachovská, Li Gong', 'Language': 'English, French', 'Runtime': '2 hours and 1 minute', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '6.5 x 5.25 x 0.25 inches; 2.88 Ounces', 'Director': 'Peter Webber', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, Import, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '2 hours and 1 minute', 'Release date': 'April 6, 2010', 'Actors': 'Gaspard Ulliel, Rhys Ifans, Li Gong, Aaran Thomas, Helena-Lia Tachovská', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Alliance', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Review Text: Sadly, the standard definition dvd has a few more additional minutes than the blu ray. So, to me anyway, the blu ray is lacking.
Review Title: Young Hannibal in blu ray.
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

Judge Dredd [Blu-ray]
Sylvester Stallone  (Actor),     Diane Lane  (Actor),     Danny Cannon  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    R    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
['Prepare yourself for the nonstop, action-adventure thrill ride JUDGE DREDD -- exploding onto Blu-ray for the first time, featuring an all-new digital restoration with enhanced picture and sound. Academy Award(R) nominees Sylvester Stallone (Best Actor, 1976, ROCKY) and Diane Lane (Best Actress, 2002, UNFAITHFUL bring the story of a legendary comic book hero to life. In a time when all-powerful "judges" act with supreme authority of both the police force and legal system, Judge Dredd is the most feared law enforcer of them all. When a former judge devises a sinister plot to bring him down, Dredd with stop at nothing to even the scales of justice!']
{'Genre': 'DREDD, SYLVESTER, STALLONE, Action/Adventure, JUDGE', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Armand Assante, Max Von Sydow, Danny Cannon, Rob Schneider, Sylvester Stallone, Diane Lane, Jurgen ProchnowArmand Assante, Max Von Sydow, Danny Cannon, Rob Schneider, Sylvester Stallone, Diane Lane, Jurgen Prochnow  See more', 'Language': 'French (Dolby Digital 5.1), English (DTS-HD High Res Audio), Spanish (Dolby Digital 2.0)', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 36 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '2.35:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Audio Description': 'English', 'Item model number': '25524900', 'Director': 'Danny Cannon', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Blu-ray, NTSC, Subtitled, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 36 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 18, 2012', 'Actors': 'Sylvester Stallone, Diane Lane, Armand Assante, Jurgen Prochnow, Rob Schneider', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish, English', 'Studio': 'HOLLYWOOD PICTURES', 'Number of discs': '1'}
What can I say? It's Stallone...with Armand Assante, Joan Chen (hubba, hubba) and Rob Schneider, et al. For me, the scene where Schneider is mimicking Stallone on the way to the penitentiary-"I am the law", still has me rolling on the floor. Cheap thrills, but, I like it.
This one was a "guilty" pleasure for me.
Demolition Man (BD) [Blu-ray]
Sylvester Stallone  (Actor),     Wesley Snipes  (Actor),     Marco Brambilla  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    R    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray, Action & Adventure
['Sylvester Stallone and Wesley Snipes go at it amid a dazzling cyber-future in this explosive hit. In 2032 archcriminal Simon Phoenix (Snipes) awakens from a 35-year deep freeze in CryoPrision to find a serene, non-violent Los Angeles ready for the taking. Unable to deal with Phoenix’s brutal 1990s style, officials seek an old-fashioned cop to fight old-fashioned crime. They revive Sgt. John Spartan (Stallone), unjustly serving a CryoPrison sentence because of his last encounter with Phoenix. Sandra Bullock, Benjamin Bratt and Denis Leary also play rough and tough in this “terrific mix of action and humor” (Joel Siegel, Good Morning America/ABC-TV).']

Lenkov', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}
Sly in another great escapist flick. Mr. Snipes, Ms. Bullock and Mr. Bratt ain't bad either.
Ahhh! Stallone again.

Charlton Heston  (Actor),     Edward G. Robinson  (Actor),     Richard Fleischer  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: Blu-ray

I love this movie as an old man. We are not yet at the end times as portrayed in the movie, but, we are rapidly approaching the point of no return.
I loved this movie as a young man.

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Genre Preference:** The user's film interests continue to embrace historical and war themes, while their exploration of the action genre and escapist narratives that blend action and humor remains strong. They now have a notable interest in horror, specifically exploring psychological aspects within the genre, along with a continuing appreciation for classic science fiction and drama.

- **Director & Actor Affinity:** The user maintains admiration for influential directors such as Mel Gibson, Ridley Scott, and Steven Spielberg, while also appreciating the work of Peter Webber. Their fondness for star power extends to actors like Sylvester Stallone and Wesley Snipes, with new additions including Gaspard Ulliel, reflecting a diverse taste in impactful storytelling.

- **Format Preference:** The user emphasizes a strong loyalty to high-quality media formats, showing a preference for Blu-ray. However, they've recently indicated some limitations with this format compared to standard DVDs, suggesting a nuanced approach to their viewing experience.

- **Value Consciousness:** The user remains focused on value in their cinematic purchases, consistently seeking items that deliver robust entertainment. Their reviews express satisfaction with personal connections to the films while also highlighting concerns about content accessibility and completeness.

- **Rating Behavior:** The user continues to rate their selections positively, yet their recent interaction reveals a critical perspective on format quality, indicating a balanced engagement between enjoyment and expectations from viewing experiences.

Overall, the user showcases a refined cinematic taste, adapting their preferences while maintaining a focus on quality and value in their collections.
